help: whoareyou - Displays information about the developer
projects - My repositories and side projects
contact - How to get in touch
quote - Shows a random motivational quote
about: I am 26 years old and I live in Bursa.
For the past two years, I have been providing web software solutions to corporate companies through my own company, billing them accordingly.
These solutions include store cash register inventory tracking, ERP, e-commerce, custom-designed websites, customer relationship management software, custom CMS, and more.
I have a strong command of PHP, Java, and JavaScript languages, and I have intermediate-level proficiency in Python.
Before establishing my own sole proprietorship, I also worked as a freelancer without invoicing for some projects,
some of which were obtained through platforms like Bionluk, while others were acquired through local connections.
I have been actively working in the industry for approximately 8 years.
I have clients not only from Turkey but also from all around the world.
I have an English proficiency level of C2.
skills: Frameworks: Symfony, Laravel, React, Vue, Electron
Tools: Docker, Git, VS Code, Figma
quote: “Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.” – Cory House
“Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.” – Harold Abelson
